name: UChaosDestructionListener
doc: Object allowing for retrieving Chaos Destruction data.

ChaosSolverActors: Which chaos solver actors we're using. If empty, this listener will fallback to the "world" solver.
GeometryCollectionActors: Which chaos solver actors we're using. If empty, this listener will fallback to the "world" solver.
OnCollisionEvents: Called when new collision events are available.
OnBreakingEvents: Called when new breaking events are available.
OnTrailingEvents: Called when new trailing events are available.
OnRemovalEvents: Called when new trailing events are available.
bIsCollisionEventListeningEnabled: Whether or not collision event listening is enabled
bIsBreakingEventListeningEnabled: Whether or not collision event listening is enabled
bIsTrailingEventListeningEnabled: Whether or not trailing event listening is enabled
bIsRemovalEventListeningEnabled: Whether or not removal event listening is enabled
CollisionEventRequestSettings: The settings to use for collision event listening
BreakingEventRequestSettings: The settings to use for breaking event listening
TrailingEventRequestSettings: The settings to use for trailing event listening
RemovalEventRequestSettings: The settings to use for removal event listening

methods.name: AddChaosSolverActor
methods.doc: Dynamically adds a chaos solver to the listener

methods.name: AddGeometryCollectionActor
methods.doc: Dynamically adds a chaos solver to the listener

methods.name: IsEventListening
methods.doc: Returns if the destruction listener is listening to any events

methods.name: RemoveChaosSolverActor
methods.doc: Dynamically removes a chaos solver from the listener

methods.name: RemoveGeometryCollectionActor
methods.doc: Dynamically removes a chaos solver from the listener

methods.name: SetBreakingEventEnabled
methods.doc: Enables or disables breaking event listening

methods.name: SetBreakingEventRequestSettings
methods.doc: Sets breaking event request settings dynamically

methods.name: SetCollisionEventEnabled
methods.doc: Enables or disables collision event listening

methods.name: SetCollisionEventRequestSettings
methods.doc: Sets collision event request settings dynamically

methods.name: SetRemovalEventEnabled
methods.doc: Enables or disables removal event listening

methods.name: SetRemovalEventRequestSettings
methods.doc: Sets removal event request settings dynamically

methods.name: SetTrailingEventEnabled
methods.doc: Enables or disables trailing event listening

methods.name: SetTrailingEventRequestSettings
methods.doc: Sets trailing event request settings dynamically

methods.name: SortBreakingEvents
methods.doc: Sorts breaking events according to the given sort method

methods.name: SortCollisionEvents
methods.doc: Sorts collision events according to the given sort method

methods.name: SortRemovalEvents
methods.doc: Sorts removal events according to the given sort method

methods.name: SortTrailingEvents
methods.doc: Sorts trailing events according to the given sort method
